page.title: 05FISHING
page.content: { FISHING. } The ponds are owned by Mick Marshall and Mr & Mrs Taylor.You can catch all kinds of fish such as bream,tench,carp & eels etc...At Mick Marshalls there are 2 ponds which are quite deep.If you catch any fish you unfortunately have to put them back.{The charge for {fishing is Â£1.50 for the day.}The biggest fish in the pond is the mirror carp & it weighs about 20 pounds.The best time to fish is at night.Taylors do not let people fish in their ponds, only friends.The biggest fish, in the smallest pond, is the tench which can weigh between 4-6 pounds. A great number of people from all over the country come to fish there as you can catch some excellent fish.At all times of day and night there are often some people fishing at one of the local ponds.
